unnormalised: Someone asked me where to find good property listings in Bangalore. Well, it depends on what you're looking for, bhai! For resale flats, check out sites like NoBroker or Magicbricks. You'll find tons of listings with addresses like "Flat No. 201, Prestige Shantiniketan, Whitefield, Bangalore 560066". They usually have photos and details, but verify everything, ok?
normalised: Someone asked me where to find good property listings in Bangalore. Well, it depends on what you are looking for, bhai! For resale flats, check out sites like NoBroker or Magicbricks. You will find tons of listings with addresses like "Flat Number two hundred and one, Prestige Shantiniketan, Whitefield, Bangalore five hundred and sixty thousand and sixty six". They usually have photos and details, but verify everything, okay?

unnormalised: If you're looking for new projects, check out the developers' websites directly. Brigade, Prestige, Sobha... they all have properties. You'll find addresses like "Brigade El Dorado, Aerospace Park, Bangalore North, 562149". Always visit the site office before booking anything! Plus, be careful of fake listings – double-check the address with the RERA number on the Karnataka RERA website. Its easy to get fooled.
normalised: If you are looking for new projects, check out the developers' websites directly. Brigade, Prestige, Sobha... they all have properties. You will find addresses like "Brigade El Dorado, Aerospace Park, Bangalore North, five hundred and sixty two thousand one hundred and forty nine". Always visit the site office before booking anything! Plus, be careful of fake listings – double-check the address with the R-E-R-A number on the Karnataka R-E-R-A website. Its easy to get fooled.

unnormalised: Finally, don't just look online. Talk to local brokers in areas like Koramangala, Jayanagar, or Indiranagar. They often know about properties before they even get listed online. An address like "Old No. 14, New No. 28, 1st Main Road, Jayanagar 3rd Block, Bangalore 560011" might not be on any website. Good luck with your search! And remember, location is key, and don't forget to check the pin code!
normalised: Finally, don't just look online. Talk to local brokers in areas like Koramangala, Jayanagar, or Indiranagar. They often know about properties before they even get listed online. An address like "Old Number fourteen, New Number twenty eight, first Main Road, Jayanagar third Block, Bangalore five hundred and sixty thousand and eleven" might not be on any website. Good luck with your search! And remember, location is key, and don't forget to check the pin code!
